videos.description: 1H (15:36) UNC Joel Berry II made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Isaiah Hicks.
videos.headline: Joel Berry hits the first 3 for the Tar Heels
Tony Bradley takes the assist from Woods and flushes it

videos.description: North Carolina is rolling against Long Beach State, especially when Isaiah Hicks gets space in the lane and throws down the massive two-handed dunk for the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: Hicks takes to the sky for huge UNC dunk
Gabe Levin joins the dunk party

videos.description: With North Carolina on the run, Joel Berry II throws the long lob to Isaiah Hicks for the highlight-reel slam for the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: Long distance alley-oops are always a fun time for UNC
